<li id="cite_note-fifteen-234"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-fifteen_234-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fifteen_234-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">From 15% sample</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-EncNYC-235"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-EncNYC_235-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-EncNYC_235-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Encyclopedia_of_New_York_City" title="The Encyclopedia of New York City">The Encyclopedia of New York City</a></i>, ed. Kenneth T. Jackson (Yale 1995, <a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/0-300-05536-6" title="Special:BookSources/0-300-05536-6">0-300-05536-6</a>), page 923, citing "U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census, Census of Population 1960 (vol.1, part A, table 28), 1970, 1980, 1990". After annexing part of the Bronx in 1874, the population of the then-New York City was 1,206,299 in 1880 and 1,515,301 in 1890.</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-236"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-236">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Harrington, Greene and (1932). <i>American Population Before the Federal Census of 1790</i>. <li id="cite_note-NYC_immigration-258"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NYC_immigration_258-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="https://www1.nyc.gov/assets/planning/download/pdf/data-maps/nyc-population/nny2013/nny_2013.pdf" rel="nofollow"><i>The Newest New Yorkers: 2013</i></a>, <a href="/wiki/New_York_City_Department_of_City_Planning" title="New York City Department of City Planning">New York City Department of City Planning</a>, December 2013. Accessed February 9, 2017. "The immigrant share of the population has also doubled since 1965, to 37 percent. With foreign-born mothers accounting for 51 percent of all births, approximately 6-in-10 New Yorkers are either immigrants or the children of immigrants."</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-259"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-259">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Semple, Kirk (December 18, 2013). <a class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2013/12/19/nyregion/chinese-diaspora-transforms-new-yorks-immigrant-population-report-finds.html?_r=0" rel="nofollow">"Immigration Remakes and Sustains City, a Report Concludes"</a>. <i>The New York Times</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-261"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-261">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Semple, Kirk (June 23, 2011). <a class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2011/06/24/nyregion/asian-new-yorkers-asian-new-yorkers-seek-power-to-match-surging-numbers.html" rel="nofollow">"Asian New Yorkers Seek Power to Match Numbers"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_New_York_Times" title="The New York Times">The New York Times</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">July 5,</span> 2011</span>. <q>Asians, a group more commonly associated with the West Coast, are surging in New York, where they have long been eclipsed in the city's kaleidoscopic racial and ethnic mix. For the first time, according to census figures released in the spring, their numbers have topped one million—nearly 1 in 8 New Yorkers—which is more than the Asian population in the cities of San Francisco and Los Angeles combined.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.atitle=Asian+New+Yorkers+Seek+Power+to+Match+Numbers&amp;rft.aufirst=Kirk&amp;rft.aulast=Semple&amp;rft.date=2011-06-23&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+New+York+Times&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2011%2F06%2F24%2Fnyregion%2Fasian-new-yorkers-asian-new-yorkers-seek-power-to-match-surging-numbers.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span></li>

<li id="cite_note-NYC_real_estate-322"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-NYC_real_estate_322-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-NYC_real_estate_322-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="https://www1.nyc.gov/assets/finance/downloads/pdf/press_release/fy2017_tentative_assessment_roll.pdf" rel="nofollow"><i>Department of Finance Publishes Fiscal Year 2017 Tentative Assessment Roll</i></a>, <a href="/wiki/New_York_City_Department_of_Finance" title="New York City Department of Finance">New York City Department of Finance</a>, January 15, 2016. "Today, Jacques Jiha, Commissioner for the Department of Finance, announced the publication of the Tentative Property Assessment Roll for fiscal year 2017, which shows the total Market Value for the upcoming year at about $1.072 trillion, an increase of $102.5 billion, or 10.6 percent from the 2016 Fiscal Year."</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-323"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-323">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Quirk, James. <cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20071222235142/http://www.northjersey.com/page.php?qstr=eXJpcnk3ZjczN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXk4NDImZmdiZWw3Zjd2cWVlRUV5eTcxNjI5NzEmeXJpcnk3ZjcxN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXkyMg%3D%3D" rel="nofollow">"Bergen offices have plenty of space"</a>. Archived from <a class="external text" href="http://www.northjersey.com/page.php?qstr=eXJpcnk3ZjczN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXk4NDImZmdiZWw3Zjd2cWVlRUV5eTcxNjI5NzEmeXJpcnk3ZjcxN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXkyMg==" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on December 22, 2007.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.btitle=Bergen+offices+have+plenty+of+space&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.northjersey.com%2Fpage.php%3Fqstr%3DeXJpcnk3ZjczN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXk4NDImZmdiZWw3Zjd2cWVlRUV5eTcxNjI5NzEmeXJpcnk3ZjcxN2Y3dnFlZUVFeXkyMg%3D%3D&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span>, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Record_(Bergen_County)" title="The Record (Bergen County)">The Record (Bergen County)</a></i>, July 5, 2007. Accessed July 5, 2007. "On Monday, a 26-year-old, 33-story office building at 450 Park Ave. sold for a stunning $1,589 per square foot, or about ,10 million. The price is believed to be the most ever paid for a U.S. office building on a per-square-foot basis. That broke the previous record—set four weeks earlier—when 660 Madison Ave. sold for $1,476 a square foot."</span></li>

<li id="cite_note-436"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-436">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">McBeth, VR. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110504160457/http://timessquare.com/NYC__/Times_Square_History/The_Great_White_Way/" rel="nofollow">"The Great White Way"</a> on TimesSquare.com. Quote: "Coined in 1901 by O.J. Gude, the designer of many prominent advertising displays, to describe the new light show that beckoned along Broadway, The Great White Way is a phrase known worldwide to describe Broadway's profusion of theaters in Times Square."</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-437"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-437">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Tell, Darcy. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=NwaLWFSG3rcC&amp;pg=PA41" rel="nofollow"><i>Times Square spectacular: lighting up Broadway</i></a> New York: HarperCollins, 2007</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-438"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-438">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Allen, Irving Lewis. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=j41z0yeKbeIC&amp;pg=PA59" rel="nofollow"><i>The City in Slang: New York Life and Popular Speech</i></a>. New York: Oxford University Press, 1995. Quote: "By 1910, the blocks of Broadway just above 42nd Street were at the very heart of the Great White Way. The glow of Times Square symbolized the center of New York, if not of the world."</span></li>

<li id="cite_note-491"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-491">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation report"><a class="external text" href="http://comptroller.nyc.gov/wp-content/uploads/documents/Longest_Work_Weeks_March_2015.pdf" rel="nofollow">The Hardest Working Cities</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span> (Report). Office of the New York City Comptroller. March 2015.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.btitle=The+Hardest+Working+Cities&amp;rft.date=2015-03&amp;rft.genre=report&amp;rft.pub=Office+of+the+New+York+City+Comptroller&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fcomptroller.nyc.gov%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2Fdocuments%2FLongest_Work_Weeks_March_2015.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span></li>
<li id="cite_note-492"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-492">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Weinberger, Rachel; Kaehny, John; Rufo, Matthew (2010). <a class="external text" href="http://www.infrastructureusa.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/itdp_parking_fullreport.pdf" rel="nofollow">"U.S. Parking Policies: An Overview of Management Strategies"</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. Institute for Transportation and Development Policy. p. 62<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">June 11,</span> 2011</span>. <q>New York City is the largest, densest and most transit- and pedestrian-oriented city in the United States. It is the only U.S. city in which a majority of households do not have a car. Despite this, New York City is very much an American city in the way it under prices and under uses curbside parking meters. Meter rates are far lower than in other leading world cities, and New York suffers from high levels of cruising and double parking (p 62) ... Nationally 90% of households own automobiles. New Yorkers own fewer at 48% with only 22% of Manhattan residents owning automobiles (page 78)</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.au=Kaehny%2C+John&amp;rft.au=Rufo%2C+Matthew&amp;rft.aufirst=Rachel&amp;rft.aulast=Weinberger&amp;rft.btitle=U.S.+Parking+Policies%3A+An+Overview+of+Management+Strategies&amp;rft.date=2010&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pages=62&amp;rft.pub=Institute+for+Transportation+and+Development+Policy&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.infrastructureusa.org%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2010%2F03%2Fitdp_parking_fullreport.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span></li>

<li id="cite_note-recordonline.com-513"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-recordonline.com_513-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="http://www.recordonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20061024/BIZ/610240312/-1/NEWS03" rel="nofollow">George Washington Bridge turns 75 years old: Huge flag, cake part of celebration</a>, <i><a href="/wiki/Times_Herald-Record" title="Times Herald-Record">Times Herald-Record</a></i>, October 24, 2006. "The party, however, will be small in comparison to the one that the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey organized for 5,000 people to open the bridge to traffic in 1931. And it won't even be on <i>what is now the world's busiest bridge</i> for fear of snarling traffic."</span></li>

<li><cite class="citation" id="CITEREFWhiteWillensky2000"><a href="/wiki/Norval_White" title="Norval White">White, Norval</a> &amp; Willensky, Elliot (2000), <i><a href="/wiki/AIA_Guide_to_New_York_City" title="AIA Guide to New York City">AIA Guide to New York City</a></i> (4th ed.), New York: Three Rivers Press, <a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-8129-3107-5" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-8129-3107-5">978-0-8129-3107-5</a></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.au=Willensky%2C+Elliot&amp;rft.aufirst=Norval&amp;rft.aulast=White&amp;rft.btitle=AIA+Guide+to+New+York+City&amp;rft.date=2000&amp;rft.edition=4th&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-8129-3107-5&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pub=Three+Rivers+Press&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/Colson_Whitehead" title="Colson Whitehead">Whitehead, Colson</a> (2003). <i>The Colossus of New York: A City in 13 Parts</i>. New York: Doubleday. <a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/0-385-50794-1" title="Special:BookSources/0-385-50794-1">0-385-50794-1</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ANew+York+City&amp;rft.aufirst=Colson&amp;rft.aulast=Whitehead&amp;rft.btitle=The+Colossus+of+New+York%3A+A+City+in+13+Parts&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=0-385-50794-1&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pub=Doubleday&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>

<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Counties</th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">

<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Regions</th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul>

<li><a href="/wiki/Central_Jersey" title="Central Jersey">Central Jersey</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Greater_Danbury" title="Greater Danbury">Greater Danbury</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Greater_New_Haven" title="Greater New Haven">Greater New Haven</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Central_Naugatuck_Valley" title="Central Naugatuck Valley">Greater Waterbury</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Hudson_Valley" title="Hudson Valley">Hudson Valley</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Lehigh_Valley" title="Lehigh Valley">Lehigh Valley</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Litchfield_Hills" title="Litchfield Hills">Litchfield Hills</a></li>

<td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3">
<div><b><a href="/wiki/Albany,_New_York" title="Albany, New York">Albany</a></b> (capital)</div>

<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Timelines of town creation</th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_town_creation_in_Downstate_New_York" title="Timeline of town creation in Downstate New York">Downstate New York</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_town_creation_in_the_Hudson_Valley" title="Timeline of town creation in the Hudson Valley">Hudson Valley</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_town_creation_in_New_York%27s_Capital_District" title="Timeline of town creation in New York's Capital District">Capital District</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_town_creation_in_New_York%27s_North_Country" title="Timeline of town creation in New York's North Country">North Country</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_town_creation_in_Central_New_York" title="Timeline of town creation in Central New York">Central New York</a></li>
<li><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Timeline_of_town_creation_in_New_York%27s_Southern_Tier&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Timeline of town creation in New York's Southern Tier (page does not exist)">Southern Tier</a></li>
<li><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Timeline_of_town_creation_in_Western_New_York&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Timeline of town creation in Western New York (page does not exist)">Western New York</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>

<div id="Summer_Paralympic_Games_host_cities" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Summer_Paralympic_Games" title="Summer Paralympic Games">Summer Paralympic Games</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_Paralympic_Games_host_cities" title="List of Paralympic Games host cities">host cities</a></div>

<div id="The_100_most_populous_metropolitan_statistical_areas_of_the_United_States_of_America" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">The 100 most populous <a href="/wiki/Metropolitan_statistical_area" title="Metropolitan statistical area">metropolitan statistical areas</a> of the United States of America</div>
</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0px;background:transparent;color:inherit;">
<div style="padding:0px;">
<table class="navbox-columns-table" style="border-spacing: 0px; text-align:left;width:auto; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;">
<tr style="vertical-align:top;">
<td style="width:5em;">   </td>
<td class="navbox-list" style="padding:0px;padding-left:3px;;;;width:20%;">
<div>
<ol>
<li><a href="/wiki/New_York_metropolitan_area" title="New York metropolitan area">New York, NY</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Los_Angeles_metropolitan_area" title="Los Angeles metropolitan area">Los Angeles, CA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Chicago_metropolitan_area" title="Chicago metropolitan area">Chicago, IL</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Dallas%E2%80%93Fort_Worth_metroplex" title="Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex">Dallas, TX</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Greater_Houston" title="Greater Houston">Houston, TX</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Washington_metropolitan_area" title="Washington metropolitan area">Washington, DC</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Delaware_Valley" title="Delaware Valley">Philadelphia, PA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Miami_metropolitan_area" title="Miami metropolitan area">Miami, FL</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Atlanta_metropolitan_area" title="Atlanta metropolitan area">Atlanta, GA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Greater_Boston" title="Greater Boston">Boston, MA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/San_Francisco%E2%80%93Oakland%E2%80%93Hayward,_CA_Metropolitan_Statistical_Area" title="San Francisco–Oakland–Hayward, CA Metropolitan Statistical Area">San Francisco, CA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Phoenix_metropolitan_area" title="Phoenix metropolitan area">Phoenix, AZ</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Inland_Empire" title="Inland Empire">Riverside, CA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Metro_Detroit" title="Metro Detroit">Detroit, MI</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Seattle_metropolitan_area" title="Seattle metropolitan area">Seattle, WA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Minneapolis%E2%80%93Saint_Paul" title="Minneapolis–Saint Paul">Minneapolis, MN</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/San_Diego_County,_California" title="San Diego County, California">San Diego, CA</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Tampa_Bay_Area" title="Tampa Bay Area">Tampa, FL</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Denver-Aurora-Lakewood,_CO_Metropolitan_Statistical_Area" title="Denver-Aurora-Lakewood, CO Metropolitan Statistical Area">Denver, CO</a></li>

</ol>

<div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini">
<ul>
<li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:World%27s_most_populous_urban_areas" title="Template:World's most populous urban areas"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;-moz-box-shadow:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li>

<div id="World.27s_fifty_most-populous_urban_areas" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">World's fifty <a href="/wiki/List_of_urban_areas_by_population" title="List of urban areas by population">most-populous urban areas</a></div>

<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0px;background:transparent;color:inherit;">
<div style="padding:0px;">

<tr style="vertical-align:top;">
<td class="navbox-list" style="padding:0px;padding-left:0.25em;;;;width:20%;">
<div>
<ol style="margin-left:2.5em">
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Japan" title="Japan"><img alt="Japan" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9e/Flag_of_Japan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Japan.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Tokyo" title="Tokyo">Tokyo</a>–<a href="/wiki/Yokohama" title="Yokohama">Yokohama</a> (<a href="/wiki/Keihin_region" title="Keihin region">Keihin</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Indonesia" title="Indonesia"><img alt="Indonesia" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="300" data-file-width="450" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Flag_of_Indonesia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Indonesia.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Flag_of_Indonesia.svg/35px-Flag_of_Indonesia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Flag_of_Indonesia.svg/45px-Flag_of_Indonesia.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jakarta" title="Jakarta">Jakarta</a> (<a href="/wiki/Jabodetabek" title="Jabodetabek">Jabodetabek</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="900" data-file-width="1350" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Delhi" title="Delhi">Delhi</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Philippines" title="Philippines"><img alt="Philippines" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="450" data-file-width="900" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Manila" title="Manila">Manila</a> (<a href="/wiki/Metro_Manila" title="Metro Manila">Metro Manila</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/South_Korea" title="South Korea"><img alt="South Korea" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/Flag_of_South_Korea.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Korea.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/Flag_of_South_Korea.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Korea.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/Flag_of_South_Korea.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Korea.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Seoul" title="Seoul">Seoul</a>–<a href="/wiki/Incheon" title="Incheon">Incheon</a> (<a href="/wiki/Seoul_Capital_Area" title="Seoul Capital Area">Sudogwon</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Shanghai" title="Shanghai">Shanghai</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Pakistan" title="Pakistan"><img alt="Pakistan" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/35px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Flag_of_Pakistan.svg/45px-Flag_of_Pakistan.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Karachi" title="Karachi">Karachi</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Beijing" title="Beijing">Beijing</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="650" data-file-width="1235" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">New York City</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Guangzhou" title="Guangzhou">Guangzhou</a>–<a href="/wiki/Foshan" title="Foshan">Foshan</a> (Guangfo)</li>
</ol>
</div>
</td>
<td class="navbox-list" style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;padding-left:0.25em;;;;width:20%;">
<div>
<ol start="11" style="margin-left:2.5em">
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="504" data-file-width="720" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/22px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/33px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/43px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/S%C3%A3o_Paulo" title="São Paulo">São Paulo</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="480" data-file-width="840" height="13" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/23px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/35px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/46px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mexico_City" title="Mexico City">Mexico City</a> (<a href="/wiki/Valley_of_Mexico" title="Valley of Mexico">Valley of Mexico</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/India" title="India"><img alt="India" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="900" data-file-width="1350" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/23px-Flag_of_India.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/35px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/41/Flag_of_India.svg/45px-Flag_of_India.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mumbai" title="Mumbai">Mumbai</a></li>

<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Taiwan" title="Taiwan"><img alt="Taiwan" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Taipei" title="Taipei">Taipei</a>-<a href="/wiki/Taoyuan,_Taiwan" title="Taoyuan, Taiwan">Taoyuan</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Hangzhou" title="Hangzhou">Hangzhou</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Hong_Kong" title="Hong Kong"><img alt="Hong Kong" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5b/Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg/23px-Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5b/Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg/35px-Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5b/Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg/45px-Flag_of_Hong_Kong.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Hong_Kong" title="Hong Kong">Hong Kong</a></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Chongqing" title="Chongqing">Chongqing</a></li>

<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Malaysia" title="Malaysia"><img alt="Malaysia" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="1400" data-file-width="2800" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/35px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/46px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Kuala_Lumpur" title="Kuala Lumpur">Kuala Lumpur</a> (<a href="/wiki/Klang_Valley" title="Klang Valley">Klang Valley</a>)</li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/China" title="China"><img alt="China" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fa/Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg/45px-Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="23"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Quanzhou" title="Quanzhou">Quanzhou</a></li>

</div>
</td>

</div>
</td>
</tr>

<div aria-labelledby="Location_of_the_capital_of_the_United_States_and_predecessors" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px">
<table class="nowraplinks collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit">
<tr>
<th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col">
<div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini">
<ul>
<li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Location_of_US_capital" title="Template:Location of US capital"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;-moz-box-shadow:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li>
<li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Location_of_US_capital" title="Template talk:Location of US capital"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;-moz-box-shadow:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li>
<li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Location_of_US_capital&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;-moz-box-shadow:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="Location_of_the_capital_of_the_United_States_and_predecessors" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_capitals_in_the_United_States" title="List of capitals in the United States">Location of the capital of the United States</a> and predecessors</div>
</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%;text-align:left;"><span style="font-weight:normal; font-size:90%;">1774</span><span class="nowrap">   </span><a href="/wiki/First_Continental_Congress" title="First Continental Congress">First Continental Congress</a></th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a href="/wiki/Philadelphia" title="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a></div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%;text-align:left;"><span style="font-weight:normal; font-size:90%;">1775–81</span><span class="nowrap">   </span><a href="/wiki/Second_Continental_Congress" title="Second Continental Congress">Second Continental Congress</a></th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a href="/wiki/Philadelphia" title="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Baltimore" title="Baltimore">Baltimore</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Lancaster,_Pennsylvania" title="Lancaster, Pennsylvania">Lancaster</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/York,_Pennsylvania" title="York, Pennsylvania">York</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Philadelphia" title="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a></div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%;text-align:left;"><span style="font-weight:normal; font-size:90%;">1781–89</span><span class="nowrap">   </span><a href="/wiki/Congress_of_the_Confederation" title="Congress of the Confederation">Congress of the Confederation</a></th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a href="/wiki/Philadelphia" title="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Princeton,_New_Jersey" title="Princeton, New Jersey">Princeton</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Annapolis,_Maryland" title="Annapolis, Maryland">Annapolis</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Trenton,_New_Jersey" title="Trenton, New Jersey">Trenton</a> <big>→</big> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">New York City</a></div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%;text-align:left;"><span style="font-weight:normal; font-size:90%;">1789–present</span><span class="nowrap">   </span><a href="/wiki/Federal_government_of_the_United_States" title="Federal government of the United States">Federal government of the United States</a></th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a class="mw-selflink selflink">New York City</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Philadelphia" title="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/Washington,_D.C." title="Washington, D.C.">Washington, D.C.</a></div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

class="interlanguage-link interwiki-zh-yue"><a class="interlanguage-link-target" href="https://zh-yue.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84" hreflang="zh-yue" lang="zh-yue" title="紐約 – Cantonese">粵語</a></li><li class="interlanguage-link interwiki-diq"><a class="interlanguage-link-target" href="https://diq.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_City" hreflang="diq" lang="diq" title="New York
